# Pesquisa Operacional 

## Definição
> Operations Research (O.R.), or operational research in the U.K, is a discipline that deals with the application of advanced analytical methods to help make better decisions. The terms management science and analytics are sometimes used as synonyms for operations research. definição da [INFORMS](https://www.informs.org/About-INFORMS/What-is-Operations-Research)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
